name: Additional Salary Check
query:
SELECT employee, employee_name, COALESCE(payroll_date, from_date) AS effective_date, amount, salary_component, type 
FROM `tabAdditional Salary` 
WHERE
  docstatus = 1
  AND (
    -- Recurring entry overlaps with target period
    (is_recurring = 1 AND (
      (from_date <= %(to_date)s AND (to_date IS NULL OR to_date >= %(from_date)s))
    ))
    OR
    -- One-time entry within period
    (is_recurring = 0 AND payroll_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s)
  )
